title: THE HYPNOTIC POWER OF THE GAZE WITH DR.PARET / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
In this video, Dr. Marco Paret and his students will demonstrate to you how powerful is the hypnotic technique Fascination - the power of the gaze, which is the main key to deep transformations. The technique of Fascination is linked to the secret power of the eye, and to the power of the gaze. Developing the power of fascination, a person is even able to heal and work with the life force. Dr. Marco Paret is teaching the ancient traditions of Mesmerism & Fascination, in modern times.
